summary.Title: Breakfast service - weekend
summary.Presentation:
Employees for our breakfast restaurant in Cabinn City

Do you have the drive to deliver exceptional service and are you passionate about making every moment matter for our

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Employees for our breakfast restaurant in Cabinn City

Do you have the drive to deliver exceptional service and are you passionate about making every moment matter for our hotel guests in our restaurant?

Job description

As an employee in our breakfast restaurant, you are primarily responsible for setting up and maintaining our breakfast buffet as well as serving our guests. Our employees in the breakfast room are a very important part of our guest’s stay in delivering a hospitality experience that goes above and beyond the guests’ expectations and creating unforgettable memories for them in our hotel.

Your main tasks include, clearing tables, cleaning of the dining/buffet area and the kitchen, as well as maintaining storage and breakfast supply inventories cost effectively. In CABINN Scandinavia we also have a conference department which falls under the responsibility of the restaurant employees.

Working hours

  • 24 hours a month (every second weekend)

We are looking for:
- an efficient, quick, and hard-working individual
- Previous background in food and beverage handling or equivalent training is an advantage

- You speak English fluently and Danish is an advantage
- You work responsibly and enjoy working independently but can also thrive in a team
- You are flexible with your shifts and can take extra shift with short notice

We offer:

  • A dynamic workplace with many possibilities of creating relationships across cultures.
  • An exciting workplace with a high pace every day
  • Fixed shifts in the same 4-week rotation – extra shifts and changes may occur
    Payment according to the current union agreement

Application only through our website, we do not accept applications by email

About CABINN A/S
CABINN is a Danish owned- and developed hotel chain with 11 hotels centrally placed in Copenhagen, Aarhus, Odense, Aalborg, Esbjerg and Vejle. Read more about CABINN and CABINN Scandinavia at www.cabinn.com
